location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Sketch map showing the projected line of the proposed route of the Trans-Persian Railway through Persia, Russia and Baluchistan

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: printed in colour on paper. Dimensions: 320 x 280mm.

mods.abstract: A Trans-Persian railway map (folio 279) showing the route (coloured red) which it was proposed the projected line should follow, as described in the separate Report issued by the Russian Committee in May 1911. The map is included in the draft memorandum published by the British Group of the Société d’Etudes (La Société Internationale d’Etudes du Chemin de fer Transpersan) and printed by Waterlow and Sons Limited, in London in 1912.
